rule.condition: flag.file in $L.file=true and not (same(file.type.html in $L.file, true)) and not (same(file.type.pdf in $L.file, true))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Flag File in CurrentRecord = true AND File Type Html in CurrentRecord != true AND File Type Pdf in CurrentRecord != true)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Flag File">flag.file</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="File Type Html">file.type.html</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="File Type Pdf">file.type.pdf</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Flag File in CurrentRecord = true AND File Type Html in CurrentRecord != true AND File Type Pdf in CurrentRecord != true))
Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Flag Email in CurrentRecord = true))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var maildisabled = lib.reportExport.isStopExportViaMail();\u000aif ( maildisabled )\u000a{\u000a var msg = system.functions.scmsg(\"305\", \"Reporting\");\u000a var dt = new Datum();\u000a system.functions.rtecall(\"msg\", dt, msg, 1, null, null, 1);\u000a}"}

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript Validation for Inbox Dashboard and Report
rule.condition: same(inbox.dashboard in $L.file, NULL) and same(inbox.report in $L.file, NULL)
rule.conditionDesc: ( inbox.dashboard in CurrentRecord = NULL AND inbox.report in CurrentRecord = NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Inbox Dashboard">inbox.dashboard</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Inbox Report">inbox.report</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation for Inbox Dashboard and Report (when ( inbox.dashboard in CurrentRecord = NULL AND inbox.report in CurrentRecord = NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Rule Arbitrary Start Time are Mandatory
rule.fullDesc: Rule Arbitrary Start Time are Mandatory (when ( rule.arbitrary in CurrentRecord = true))

rule.ruleDesc: Rule Type;Rule Valid from;Rule Start Time are Mandatory
rule.condition: same(rule.arbitrary in $L.file, NULL) or rule.arbitrary in $L.file=false
rule.conditionDesc: ( rule.arbitrary in CurrentRecord = NULL OR rule.arbitrary in CurrentRecord = false)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Rule Arbitrary">rule.arbitrary</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Rule Arbitrary">rule.arbitrary</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">false</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Rule Type;Rule Valid from;Rule Start Time are Mandatory (when ( rule.arbitrary in CurrentRecord = NULL OR rule.arbitrary in CurrentRecord = false))

rule.condition: not (same(flag.email in $L.file, true)) and not (same(flag.file in $L.file, true))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Flag Email in CurrentRecord != true AND Flag File in CurrentRecord != true)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Flag Email">flag.email</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Flag File">flag.file</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( Flag Email in CurrentRecord != true AND Flag File in CurrentRecord != true))
